Conspiracies arise within the Frontier government when Sheryl Nome arrives to the colonial fleet for her concert and is soon marked as a spy for Galaxy while childhood friends, Alto Saotome and Ranka Lee both try to achieve their dreams as the battle between Frontier and the Vajra draws closer.","poster_path":"/uO4IgxJGgqoIyEnYYerLXDxlHBc.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[18,10749,16,878],"popularity":20.128,"release_date":"2009-11-21","video":false,"vote_average":7.052,"vote_count":29},{"backdrop_path":"/2T8MxE14arzpciX7r9GBnjvI4rA.jpg","id":45932,"title":"Macross 7: The Galaxy is Calling Me","original_title":"マクロス7 銀河がオレを呼んでいる!","overview":"Basara, on one of his frequent trips across the galaxy to spread the message of his music, folds in on an icy planet. The natives are hostile, and take him prisoner until he begins to sing for them and a little boy named Pedro recognizes his voice. They release Basara, and almost as soon as they don, a strange wailing voice comes from the nearby mountains. Basara and Pedro head out in Basara's valkyrie to investigate the noise. Little do they know, an ambush is waiting for them.","poster_path":"/47yDZ168HoOnIK0lrSAjKaIcgG3.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,28,878,10402],"popularity":10.166,"release_date":"1995-10-07","video":false,"vote_average":5.8,"vote_count":13},{"backdrop_path":"/ppHLZbqYYvq1Ps6mdN6kQLQyqoK.jpg","id":60964,"title":"Macross Frontier: The Wings of Farewell","original_title":"劇場版 マクロスF 恋離飛翼 ～サヨナラノツバサ～","overview":"Picking up from where the previous movie left off, Ranka's star career flourishes while Sheryl's health rapidly deteriorates after collapsing during a live performance. At the same time, separate factions are maneuvering behind the scenes seeking to control the Vajra horde by utilizing the singing abilities of the two songstresses. As the entire Macross Frontier fleet begins to wage its final war on the Vajra, Alto finally makes a choice between Ranka and Sheryl.","poster_path":"/ljGAhe56rJ2DCRGrrd5FZ5xCBPN.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[28,16,10749],"popularity":19.127,"release_date":"2011-02-26","video":false,"vote_average":7.1,"vote_count":14},{"backdrop_path":"/f1MwrnVB8eQyeJc3wQV7k1sZsz1.jpg","id":14132,"title":"Macross: Do You Remember Love?","original_title":"超時空要塞マクロス 愛・おぼえていますか","overview":"It is A.D. 2009 and the human race is caught in a war between giant humanoids, male Zentrans and female Meltrans. They trek the globe, unraveling clues and dodging the attentions of both the Mafia and the tenacious Inspector Zenigata. The stakes have never been higher as Zenigata enlists a team of five beautiful and determined policewomen to lure Lupin the Third into handcuffs. But an elderly drunken woman named Rosetta may be the key to solving the location of this fabulous, ancient treasure.","poster_path":"/kpLbAF7NOBGEf1ocGKIIoiDhovC.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,28,12,35,80],"popularity":16.416,"release_date":"1985-07-13","video":false,"vote_average":6.3,"vote_count":52},{"backdrop_path":"/1FBByew9RnXQ2HFqf7b6EWkyzTP.jpg","id":9606,"title":"Metropolis","original_title":"メトロポリス","overview":"Kenichi and his detective uncle, Shunsaku Ban, leave Japan to visit Metropolis, in search of the criminal, Dr. Laughton.
